# ec_customer_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ec_customer_user" "my_customer_user" {
  account_number = "A1234"
  first_name     = "Admin_First_Name"
  last_name      = "Admin_Last_Name"
  email          = "Admin@{domain}.com"
  is_admin       = true # cannot be modified after user creation

  #optional
  address1 = ""
  address2 = ""
  city = ""
  state = ""
  country = ""
  fax = ""
  mobile = ""
  phone = ""
  title = ""
  zip = ""
}
```

### Required

- **account_number** (String)

### Optional

- **address1** (String)
- **address2** (String)
- **city** (String)
- **country** (String)
- **email** (String)
- **fax** (String)
- **first_name** (String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **is_admin** (Boolean)
- **last_name** (String)
- **mobile** (String)
- **phone** (String)
- **state** (String)
- **title** (String)
- **zip** (String)

### Read-Only

- **custom_id** (String)
- **last_login_date** (String)
